inclusion.criterion: gestational age of 34 weeks or over
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: undergoing corrective surgery of congenital anomaly of the digestive tract
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pre-natal or early neonatal (within the first 72 hours after birth) diagnoses of congenital or acquired hepato-biliary disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: later neonatal diagnoses of any above mentioned pathology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
